name: Medical certificate validity for first class pilots

testSteps.description: 1: Medical certificate validity for first class pilots ({age=35, date of last medical=April 15 2023, date limit=April 30 2024, notes=License is valid until the end of the month})

children.description: Given Frank is a 1st class pilot
When Frank's last medical was on the April 15 2023
Then his next medical should be no later than April 30 2024

testSteps.description: 2: Medical certificate validity for first class pilots ({age=25, date of last medical=February 28 2023, date limit=February 29 2024, notes=Leap Year})

children.description: Given Frank is a 1st class pilot
When Frank's last medical was on the February 28 2023
Then his next medical should be no later than February 29 2024

testSteps.description: 3: Medical certificate validity for first class pilots ({age=45, date of last medical=March 15 2023, date limit=September 30 2023, notes=})

children.description: Given Frank is a 1st class pilot
When Frank's last medical was on the March 15 2023
Then his next medical should be no later than September 30 2023

testSteps.description: 4: Medical certificate validity for first class pilots ({age=45, date of last medical=September 20 2023, date limit=March 31 2024, notes=})

children.description: Given Frank is a 1st class pilot
When Frank's last medical was on the September 20 2023
Then his next medical should be no later than March 31 2024

userStory.narrative:
In order to stay compliant with air regulations and continue to fly legally
  As a pilot
  I want to know when my next medical is due

title: Medical certificate validity for first class pilots

rule.name: All of the FAA validities are measured from the last day of the month

values: License is valid until the end of the month
